name: Forbidden Arcanist
text:
Increase the mana cost of your spells by 2.
Whenever you spend mana to cast a spell, roll that many dice. For each die, on a 5 or higher, you regain 1 mana; otherwise, you lose 1 health and gain 1 forbidden secret. Forbidden secrets dissipate when you recover.

You gain the Dark Discovery ability:
Cost: 1 AP, 6 forbidden secrets.
You regain 1 signature.
